name: Plague Doctor Panic
description:
This game was made for a college project soooo it's kinda trash :/

How to Play:

Welcome to Plague Doctor Panic

The year is 1665 and the bubonic plague has taken over London. As the Plague Doctor it is your job to go around a architecturally inaccurate London and cure houses of their ailments while on a time limit.

Each house you cure grants you bonus points and an increase in time. Scattered around the map are herbs - extra points, Hourglasses - bonus time, and strange brews - potions which randomly give positive or negative effects.

There are three levels of difficulty.

  Easy - Less points and more time. For a more relaxing experience.

  Hard - More points and less time. Rewards skill and careful planning

  Epidemic - Miasmas have taken over London which instakill you, only

  for the most worthy plague doctors.

Tune in next year for Great Fire of London Runner
